link.title: FITCHBURG PUBLIC SCHOOLS

p.strong: CONTACT US AT FPSQUESTIONS@FITCHBURG.K12.MA.US WITH ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS.

div.p: No meal distribution on Monday, April 20, due to the Patriots’ Day holiday. Families will be able to pick up additional meals on Friday, April 17.
Actualización de distribución de comidas FPS
No habrá distribución de comidas el lunes 20 de abril, debido a las vacaciones del Día de los Patriotas. Las familias podrán recoger comidas adicionales el viernes 17 de abril.

div.small: This is Superintendent of Schools, Robert Jokela. You will receive an email from your child’s school principal who will be sharing the Commonwealth’s Commissioner of Education, Jeff Riley’s letter to parents about how schools will be operating during the Covid-19 crisis. The letter addresses the Department of Education’s remote learning recommendations, as well as updates on a range of other matters related to the school closures. I understand this is a challenging time for you and your family and we want to keep your child engaged for their eventual return to school, currently scheduled for May 4, 2020.

Estos es en parte del superintendente Robert Jokela. Recibirá un correo electrónico del director de la escuela de su hijo compartiendo la carta del Comisionado de Educación de Massachusetts, Jeff Riley a los padres sobre cómo funcionarán las escuelas durante la crisis de Covid-19. La carta explica las recomendaciones de aprendizaje remoto del Departamento de Educación, así como últimas noticias sobre una variedad de otros asuntos relacionados con el cierre de escuelas. Entiendo que este es un momento desafiante para usted y su familia y queremos mantener a su hijo comprometido para su regreso eventual a la escuela, actualmente programado para el 4 de mayo de 2020.

p.em: The mission of the Fitchburg Public Schools is to provide coordinated curricular and extracurricular experiences that inspire students to develop the academic, intellectual, creative, technological, and social skills necessary to work and to participate in our democratic society.

a.title: Open Presentation, Google Sites Slide Show
